Class org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack

Added Methods
ItemStack add() Adds 1 to this itemstack.
ItemStack add(int) Adds quantity to this itemstack.
void addItemFlags(ItemFlag[]) Set itemflags which should be ignored when rendering a ItemStack in the Client.
ItemStack asOne() Clones the itemstack and returns it a single quantity.
ItemStack asQuantity(int) Clones the itemstack and returns it as the specified quantity
ItemStack deserializeBytes(byte[]) Deserializes this itemstack from raw NBT bytes.
ItemStack ensureServerConversions() Minecart updates are converting simple item stacks into more complex NBT oriented Item Stacks.
String getI18NDisplayName() Gets the Display name as seen in the Client.
Set<ItemFlag> getItemFlags() Get current set itemFlags.
List<String> getLore() If the item has lore, returns it, else it will return null
int getMaxItemUseDuration()  
boolean hasItemFlag(ItemFlag) Check if the specified flag is present on this item.
void removeItemFlags(ItemFlag[]) Remove specific set of itemFlags.
byte[] serializeAsBytes() Serializes this itemstack to raw bytes in NBT.
void setLore(List<String>) Sets the lore for this item.
ItemStack subtract() Subtracts 1 to this itemstack.
ItemStack subtract(int) Subtracts quantity to this itemstack.
